name: CTO Realty Growth, Inc.
description: CTO Realty Growth, Inc. is a real estate investment trust (REIT) that specializes in acquiring, developing, and managing income-generating retail and commercial properties. Founded in 2013, the company has established a strategic focus on single-tenant properties, primarily those leased to high-quality tenants with strong credit profiles. CTO aims to enhance shareholder value through a disciplined investment strategy and an active asset management approach. The company’s portfolio includes properties located in core markets across the United States, providing a diverse income stream while maintaining a commitment to prudent capital management. In addition to its real estate investments, CTO actively explores opportunities in new development projects and joint ventures, seeking to leverage its expertise and enhance long-term returns. With a focus on sustainability and community engagement, CTO Realty Growth is dedicated to creating environments that benefit both tenants and the communities in which they operate. The company is publicly traded, allowing investors to participate in the growth and income generated from its real estate assets.

seo.meta_title: CTO Realty Growth, Inc. | Real Estate Investment Trust
seo.meta_description: Explore CTO Realty Growth, Inc., a leading REIT focused on high-quality retail and commercial properties. Learn about our investment strategy, portfolio, and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does CTO Realty Growth focus on?
faq.answer: CTO Realty Growth focuses on acquiring and managing income-generating retail and commercial properties.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of CTO Realty Growth?
faq.answer: John M. Albright is the CEO of CTO Realty Growth, Inc.

faq.question: Where is CTO Realty Growth headquartered?
faq.answer: CTO Realty Growth is headquartered in Orlando, Florida, USA.

faq.question: What types of properties does CTO Realty Growth invest in?
faq.answer: CTO invests primarily in single-tenant retail and commercial properties.

faq.question: When was CTO Realty Growth founded?
faq.answer: CTO Realty Growth was founded in 2013.
